content: We were united by our conviction that America was the worlds most exceptional country, blessed with the most incredible heroes, and that this was a land worth defending with our very last breath, Tru… [+7511 chars]

author: David Ignatius
title: Bahrain’s diplomatic agreement with Israel is a building block toward Middle East stability
description: The deal is significant, though a Palestinian-Israeli peace agreement looks as far away as ever.
content: The significance of Bahrains action is partly that it wouldnt have happened without the blessing of Saudi Arabia, which is joined by a causeway to the small Persian Gulf state. The Saudis have histor… [+3983 chars]

title: Carolyn Hax Live (September 18)
